creator: dan@wellogic.com
text:
When using Tyrex provided ServerDataSource, java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError on 
org/omg/CosTransactions/Inactive is thrown.  I believe JTS provides this class.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
OTS provides this class, actually. I'm not too happy about the prospect of
shipping this with TC. Tyrex requires some effort to configure, and will be
replaced with  the more limited but easier to use commons-dbcp in the next major
version (unfortunately, it wasn't available at the time for 4.0.x).
